column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you're short on time
column2: just pick up the map brochure with the "greatest hits" on the back page
column3: and go through it in about an hour.  Conversely
column4: you could spend an entire day wandering through all the galleries overdosing on great art and still not see the entire collection.  With our membership
column5: I've visited a couple times every month for a year now
column6: and still not sure I've seen everything.
